title: Cookie Consent
shortDescription: GDPR cookie consent banner, Auto block script before accept.
longDescription:
The Cookie Consent plugin will assist you in making your website GDPR compliant. 

Main Features:  
ðŸ’¯ 100% Free to use.  
ðŸš« Autoblock non-essential scripts and trackers before user consent.  
ðŸ”¥ Customize the cookie consent banner to match your website.  
ðŸ”› Give users the ability to toggle their privacy settings.  
âœ… Compatible with all websites on Cloudflare.  
ðŸ”Œ Easy two-click installation without having to signup or pay.


Here is what it will look like when more options button is clicked on the bar:
![Cloudflare cookie plugin demo](https://collectcdn.com/assets/cloudflare/cookie-example.png)


List of scripts that are automatically blocked before user consent and after switching off non-necessary cookies:
* Google Analytics
* SoundCloud
* Vimeo
* Google Ads
* Slideshare
* Hotjar 
* Youtube embeds
* Linkedin widget
* Facebook widgets
* Instagram widget
* Share this widget
* Add this widget
* Twitter widget
* Pinterest widget


Check out https://collect.chat if you need a 100% automated chatbot for your website for lead generation & data collection.
author: Collect.chat Inc.

cookieText.default: We use cookies to improve your experience on our site.
cookieText.placeholder: Text to be shown for cookies
cookieText.title: Cookie Text

proposedApp.title: Cookie Consent
proposedApp.shortDescription: Show cookie consent banner, Automatic blocking on decline.
proposedApp.longDescription:
The Cookie Consent plugin will assist you in making your website GDPR compliant. 

Main Features:
* 100% Free to use.
* Auto block non-essential scripts and trackers before user consent
* Customize cookie consent banner to match your website.
* Give users the ability to toggle their privacy settings
* Compatible with all websites on Cloudflare
* Easy two-click installation without having to signup or pay.
proposedApp.author: Collect.chat Inc.
